description:
This trailhead is just outside Manning Park West Gate, but I have driven through to the Lake(or within 300m) in a 2 wheel drive truck in Aug 2006 through Sowaqua Forest Service
Directions
(Access through the Coquilla Highway) about 15mins North of Hope.  The logging road goes up to the back end(recently cleared for 2wd pickup) and within 500m of lake.(there are 2 ways to get to the lake, mostly drive, or hike up there by the manning west gate)
title: Ghostpass Lake
